EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Ok will do. Not quite yet, they never signed the agreement. I keep asking them Stuart for it but have not received any movement. Right now only MBO has signed…. ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. From: m_kuzmajr1@yahoo.com [mailto:m_kuzmajr1@yahoo.com] Sent: Thursday, February 07, 2013 2:57 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: SOW for Mike Kuzma Yes, do it. I thought we were done.Sent on the Sprint® Now Network from my BlackBerry®From: Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> Date: Thu, 7 Feb 2013 19:34:12 +0000To: m_kuzmajr1@yahoo.com<m_kuzmajr1@yahoo.com <mailto:m_kuzmajr1@yahoo.com%3cm_kuzmajr1@yahoo.com>>Subject: RE: SOW for Mike Kuzma Hi Mike, Thanks for sending this. Don’t do any work for them until we have the fully executed PSA CA95400002 Release 001. They have not gotten it back to me so right now there is no contract and you would be working at risk. If you would like, I can reach out to Bob about this. Please let me know. Thanks,Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdm5SoF176vaLc4n0nj3PddartLEXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdm5SoF176vaLc4n0nj3PddartLEXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdm5SoF176vaLc4n0nj3PddartLEXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> to MBO Partners! From: m_kuzmajr1@yahoo.com <mailto:m_kuzmajr1@yahoo.com> [mailto:m_kuzmajr1@yahoo.com <mailto:m_kuzmajr1@yahoo.com>] Sent: Thursday, February 07, 2013 12:07 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Fw: SOW for Mike Kuzma FyiSent on the Sprint® Now Network from my BlackBerry®From: "Smout, Bob" <Bob_Smout@sra.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:Bob_Smout@sra.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdm5SoF176vaLc4n0nj3PddartLEXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>> Date: Thu, 7 Feb 2013 16:20:05 +0000To: Mike Kuzma<m_kuzmajr1@yahoo.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:m_kuzmajr1@yahoo.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdm5SoF176vaLc4n0nj3PddartLEXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>>Cc: Schier, Ron<Ron_Schier@sra.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:Ron_Schier@sra.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdm5SoF176vaLc4n0nj3PddartLEXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>>Subject: RE: SOW for Mike Kuzma Hi Mike. I’m Bob Smout, capture manager for Army HRC IT. Ron has been assigned to another capture effort, so I’m taking over for him. Please give me a call at your convenience, so we can start our dialog and get you assigned to some capture tasks. We haven’t heard anything yet about a delay in the RFP, so we’re proceeding with the capture and proposal plan. Next week, we’ll start our solution development process and you could help us with customer insight and requirements definition. You can reach me at 703-803-2467 (office) or 703-350-5221 (mobile). Thank you for your help. Bob From: Mike Kuzma [mailto:m_kuzmajr1@yahoo.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:m_kuzmajr1@yahoo.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdm5SoF176vaLc4n0nj3PddartLEXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>] Sent: Wednesday, December 12, 2012 5:39 PM To: Schier, Ron Subject: SOW for Mike Kuzma Ron,Made only a minor change to the first bullet, looking forward to the next step. Mike Kuzma
